attributes.action: Stop refuse collection crews arbitrarily nominating 'The Correct Collection Point'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
'The Correct Collection Point' system allows refuse crews to designate a collection point for wheeled bins without the prior agreement of local householders.

This arbitrary procedure is often applied by crews in an intimidating manner, simply by refusing to empty the bins of any householder who disagrees with their unilateral decision.

Householders should not be forced to move waste themselves, i.e. partially perform a service which they already pay for out of their Council Tax.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
